reviewText: nice, too bad its not with English subtitles. someday they may release with English as an option.

I have an English version of this on a VHS tape and was hoping for a better print. I got that. But I was also expecting, at the very least, English subtitles, or, since this was originally an English language film, dialogue in English with German subtitles. What I got was German only with no subtitles. It would have been nice if the seller had noted that.
a truly fine work of espionage the characters are believable and the story  line makes you feel you're a part of the excitement drama and final outcome
